All Classes

Class Description
AboutDialog
AboutDialog class help to load the about JDialog from the HTML file.
ClipboardActions
ClipboardActions class handle the clipboard actions like- cut, copy, paste.
DialogType
DialogType enumeration help to specify the type of dialog according to the app requirement.
EditMenuActions  
EditMenuActions.DeleteEditAction  
EditMenuActions.FindEditAction  
EditMenuActions.ReplaceEditAction  
EditMenuActions.SelectAllEditAction  
EditMenuActions.UndoEditAction  
FileMenuActions  
FileMenuActions.ExitFileAction  
FileMenuActions.NewFileAction  
FileMenuActions.NewWindowFileAction  
FileMenuActions.OpenFileAction  
FileMenuActions.SaveAsFileAction  
FileMenuActions.SaveFileAction  
FindAndReplaceDialog
FindAndReplaceDialog class handle both type of dialog, whether it is Find-Dialog or is Replace-Dialog (by making separate inner classes for both the Dialog).
FindAndReplaceDialog.FindDialog
FindDialog inner class handle the Finding part of the MSNotepad.
FindAndReplaceDialog.ReplaceDialog
ReplaceDialog inner class handle the Replacing part of the Edit menu.
FontDialog
FontDialog class handle the font choosing function of the MSNotepad, this Dialog uses the GroupLayout as the LayoutManager.
FormatMenuActions  
FormatMenuActions.FontChangeFormatAction  
FormatMenuActions.WordWrapFormatAction  
GUIHandler
GUIHandler class handle the main gui functioning of the MSNotepad, this is the point of distribution of work to other classes.
HelpMenuActions  
HelpMenuActions.AboutNotepadAction  
HelpMenuActions.SendFeedbackAction  
HelpMenuActions.ViewHelpAction  
InitialValues
InitialValues class help to get the initial values of the MSNotepad, and, also save these parameters in the "Settings.txt" file at the window close and load these parameters again in the variables at the start.
MainLauncher
MainLauncher is the starting point of this Notepad, Moreover, it also set it's look and launch the GUIHandler class, Which handle the further execution.
OptionPane
OptionPane class help to make initial OptionPane for the MSNotepad.
StatusBar
StatusBar class make basic statusBar for the MSNotepad, with the help of the JPanel.
StatusBar.StatusBarLabel
StatusBarLabel inner class help to make label ready for to be added on the statusBar panel.
ViewMenuActions  
ViewMenuActions.DefaultZoomAction  
ViewMenuActions.StatusBarViewAction  
ViewMenuActions.ZoomInAction  
ViewMenuActions.ZoomOutAction
